release.action: Added checksums manifest file to the products package delivered by the transport-registry service.

release.description: This release of the Transport Service is a component of the integrated release 4.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Modified to utilize the RegistryHandler methods from the registry-core component.
Enabling easier URL syntax for product requests, maintain backward compatibility with DIS-style syntax.
Fixed bug related to unspecified identifier(s) in product request.
Enabled "identifier" and "package" parameter names to be case insensitive. Enabled "package" parameter value to be case insensitive.
Enabling application to query multiple PDS registries.

release.description: This release of the Transport Service is a component of the integrated release 4.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
release.action: Initial revision of this implementation of the Transport Service based on the Apache OODT Web Grid Product Server and includes a handler for interfacing with the Registry Service.
